Name: Mr. McPaws
Bio: Mr. McPaws is one of the cutest pups you'll ever meet. While he is young, he has an old soul, hence the prefix 'Mr'. Mr. McPaws enjoys playing fetch, eating potato chips and snuggling up on a couch.

Name: Spot
Bio: Spot is a ball of energy. She is always in the mood for an intense game of fetch. You'll get extra brownie point if you scratch her behind her ears.

Name: Garfield
Bio: Garfield is an overweight tabby cat. He is famously lazy, sarcastic, arrogant, selfish, etc. His appetite is unsatiable and his diet mainly consists of lasagna. Still, people seems to love him
